unlockPublishing.title: Unlock publishing
unlockPublishing.paragraph1: Before you publish your first form, provide the contact information of your manager or the person you report to. GC Forms will not display their contact information publicly.

field1.title: Provide the email of your manager, or the person you report to
field1.description: We'll notify them about your publishing ability in GC Forms and our service-level agreement.

field2.title: What department or organization do you work for?

field3.title: What are your program or service goals?

whatNext.title: What happens next?
whatNext.paragraph1: We'll process your request and notify your manager about your publishing ability in GC Forms and our service-level agreement.
whatNext.paragraph2: It may take up to 2 business days before you can publish.
whatNext.paragraph3: You'll receive an email notification when publishing has been unlocked.
whatNext.paragraph4: While you wait, you can continue to explore and draft forms.

submissionError: There was an error. Please try again later.
